description: This file defines the DalleTools class, a toolkit for generating images using OpenAI's DALL-E models. It includes initialization, validation, and image creation methods, and interacts with external OpenAI API and project-specific classes like Agent, Team, and ImageArtifact.

classes.name: DalleTools
classes.description: A toolkit class for generating images with DALL-E models, extending the Toolkit base class, with methods for initialization and image creation.

methods.name: create_image
methods.description: Generates an image based on a prompt using the OpenAI API, and adds the resulting images to the agent or team.
